Author: Wendi H
Body: I enjoy this app and use it daily. I use the mood and journal questions feature more than anything else, and it's nice for a moment of reflection and perspective. I like the themes and find them plentiful; keep in mind I can't even draw stick people. A small glitch: questions early this year reflecting on this previous year actually say the current year: "What is your best memory/was your biggest challenge of 2023?"

Author: Diversión con Icíar
Body: Me encanta la aplicación, esta muy bien diseñada aunque hay algunos detalles que me molestan, como que es difícil editar las actividades para hacer, no se pueden eliminar o cambiar de grupo

Author: Gaia Vita
Body: Mi piace tantissmo

Author: Diam Ond
Body: Woooooow

Author: john mooney
Body: I luv this app but its not very use-full and you have to pay to have a nice wallpaper on the mood calender

Author: Jessica Lindsay-Sonkin
Body: I've been using this app since close to the beginning and it's really made a difference in my life. I'm happy to pay premium for the gorgeous themes!

Author: Iole Marra
Body: Do 3 stelle perché l app e carina da come ho visto . Il problema di questa app è che x chi nn sa l inglese nn capisce quello che c'è scritto. Infatti avevo visto il francese , lo spagnolo,l inglese ecc. Ma pochissime lingue. :)

Author: Aky
Body: No se

Author: Lucia Vezoli
Body: Bien.bueno.

Author: Paula Bohling
Body: Ich hatte die App jetzt ziemlich lange. Ich finde sie eigentlich ziemlich gut. Hängt nicht. Allerdings kann man nur seinen mood eingeben. Man kann zwischen 6 verschiedenen Themen wählen. Und bei 12 Monaten im Jahr (+ einige findet man nicht schön) ist es ziemlich wenig auswahl.

Author: Matt
Body: I've been using it for over 2 years. I really wish premium wasn't so expensive, i would totally pay for it otherwise

Author: Alexandru Ionuț
Body: It's the best app ever if you don't want to make a bullet journal, and I already don't wanna field, because you've done it before we're tired, did you another one this app helps you so much.

Author: Heidi Engelbretson
Body: The visual is HUGE for me! It's very important that I see how my mood changes over time. And even within a day. This is the only app that let's me see that at a glance. I do wish I had access to a few more options for free, and I think the premium access is way overpriced. Hence 4 stars instead of 5.

Author: Felicity Dowdle (Mindmage)
Body: Decent app been great to keep record of my mood.

Author: Jamila Dahmani

Author: Hollis Gatewood
Body: Great app but the paid version is way too expensive. Plus I got a new phone and now the app won't send me notifications, even though they are turned on. Makes zero sense.

Author: Victoria Hartard
Body: I was bored so I went to the dollar store to make one, but the I realized it was to hard, so I downloaded this! This is actually amazing for lazy people so five stars for me!

Author: Candice Lewis
Body: Very useful, would be nice to have a period tracker so I wouldn't need separate apps.

Author: Natalie Sek
Body: It's simple to use and you can customize the colours. 3 stars because it reset my tracker out of nowhere and I lost 3 months of progress that I dont know how to restore. It's quite disheartening and I won't be using this anymore.

Author: Kimberly Jean Mlejnek
Body: This is so beautiful and has so many ways to help you to write in journal everyday it I can't decide between it and my diary so often I copy and paste each other days so I have both

Author: Google User
Body: Edit 2022-04-08: A nice app overall, but I dislike that previously free themes cost money now. I'm not against paying for more themes at all - but what's free initially should stay free. Also super not a fan of the subscription model. I would have been happy to purchase Premium one time, but like this I will be looking for another app.

Author: Graciela Sanchez
Body: Cvr

Author: Lisa Agin
Body: **** I think it truly sucks that you all removed 95% of the Themes in the Free App! That was Chicken $#!T!**** Works well! I record my Mood & what I've done, during the day! No more trying to remember what day I did what. I recommended this app to our Family Therapist! ****Recently, I was extremely disappointed to discover that they now have 95% of their themes available only if you pay for Premium****! They used to be much better! 🤔

Author: Carina c
Body: Nach 424 Tagen werde ich die Wpp jetzt löschen. Die deutsche 'Übersetzung' ist zT unverständlich (das passiert halt, wenn man alles nur per Maschine 'übersetzt', ohne einen echten Übersetzer einschalten zu wollen). Die kostenfreie Version macht keinen Spaß mehr (nur noch zwei Bilder zur Auswahl, bugs, etc) und wenn man ehrlich ist, ist die App nicht vielseitig genug, um dafür zu bezahlen.

Author: Luz Carrasco
Body: I really love it, i found this interesting and accessible so i love it really 💕 Super recomendada

Body: Deletes ratings and info from people

Author: Ellen Persson
Body: This is the best journaling app I've found! Had it for over a year and its minimalist yet artsy design keeps me coming back. Premium mode is definitely worth it as well!

Author: ai yusmaniar
Body: aplikasi nya sih bagus aku kasih bitang 5 karena bagus

Author: Chaeli Alsdorf
Body: This app is so amazing and extremely helpful if you are someone who has a messy head and needs a little clean up every now and then. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because there is only 2 themes available for free, but all in all this is an amazing app that I will be using for a long time😊 Highly recommended!!!!

Author: rayan chamli
Body: I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn't for the fact that all themes were moved to (only premium accounts) available at least leave a couple of themes not just two which aren't even that good, not all of us can afford premium accounts you know 😒😒💁🏻‍♀️💁🏻‍♀️

Author: mod Anvi
Body: It only had two free ones 🤗

Author: Roos Muires
Body: Leuke app met handige meldingen om het elke dag in te vullen. Een nadeel is dat er maar twee gratis thema's zijn; de rest is premium en dus zal je daarvoor (veel!) moeten betalen. Het zou leuk zijn dat je af en toe een gratis premium thema zou mogen gebruiken om het gebruik van de app te stimuleren.

Author: Kornélia Sas
Body: Nagyon jó az alkalmazás csak egy baj van vele: 2 dolog ingyenes és a többi nem elszomorít m ők kor végre találok 3gy jó appot de prémium kell hozzá 🥲

Author: Chris Lipscomb
Body: I saw this app on a reddit post back in 2020. I tried it out shortly after, and i've used it every day since. Tracking my mood helps to keep things in perspective for me, and overall using this app has had a net positive impact on my daily mental health. I like the fun backgrounds. I've recommended this to several other people as well. Thanks for making a cool product.

Author: SoSa
Body: It's gorgeous, very aesthetic!

Author: Anna Sebola
Body: It is a really great app, it notifies me to do my to do chores n stuff, it asks me about my mood n it is a journal too so I am enjoying it and it helps me keep track of my duties and all so great job

Author: J Reimer
Body: Gave this app a try after reading a SK local had created it. Been using for a year now and find it's great for debriefing at the end of the day. The reminders are very handy. I found the free version good - I like the trees - and went premium for some more artwork, the backup, and to support the dev. Thanks for making this app! One suggestion is it would be nice to have a finer rating scale (i.e. all the numbers from 1 to 10) even if it were a custom feature.

Author: Michela
Body: Carinissima, anche se preferirei una maggiore varietà di temi per i mood trackers. Aggiorno: i temi gratis sono diventati solo due, che esagerazione. Peccato, perché è davvero un'ottima app...

Author: Pauline Lc
Body: Les plus : Le journal propose de répondre à une question différente chaque jour. Les moins : Depuis peu, il n'y a que 2 visuels disponibles gratuitement... Vraiment dommage surtout que l'abonnement n'est pas donné.

Author: Tuva Sundell
Body: Helt okej, men för många ,Premium features"

Author: Johanna Aare
Body: Just started, really good but the free themes are kinda getting bring, please add more. Execpt that its a really good app for mood tracking.

Author: Maria Vieira
Body: Habits don't fit well

Body: Je fais 4⭐ car juste il y a que 2 thèmes qui sont gratuits .J'aimerai qu'il y a plus de thèmes gratuits.

Author: Elisa Martinoni
Body: Tutto a pagamento. Sono veramente pochissime le cose gratis, farebbero prima a mettere direttamente l'app a pagamento.

Author: Axley
Body: For the most part, I really like this app. It's easy to use and I love the color pallettes and daily prompts. But with only 2 free themes, I don't see myself using this long term. After a bit, I could see that getting very repetitive and that would take the fun out of it. Please add more

Author: Sergio Ferreira
Body: Se jeux est génial ! Mais il manque des petites choses....

Author: Serenity Spratt
Body: this app is ok... it was nice kinda the it went downhill with glitches like just black screen and no it was not just my computer it was helpfull for tracking mood but it seemed to make me more mad

Author: Camilla Guglielmo
Body: Ho dato due stelle a questa App perché è molto carina ed è anche molto curata. Ma il suo problema è che siccome l'italiano non c'è non si capisce un granché, quindi preferirei avere anche anche la lingua Italia. Nel compelesso è molto carina.

Author: Alexia Tillman
Body: This app is really awesome for keeping track of my irregular emotions. It also acts as a bit of a bullet journal where you can answer journal prompts and track habits.

Author: Gwen Roelofs
Body: It works very well but there are only 2 themes available. These are not detailed like the premiums, otherwise you need to pay more then it is actually worth.

Author: Luna Tika
Body: J´adore mon bullet en permanence sur moi c´est genial merci pour cette idee

Author: Florentine Schubert
Body: Diese App hat zwar eine sehr gute Qualität aber eigentlich soll es ein Bullet Journal für mich sein. Jedoch kann ich nur meinen Mood Tracker ausfüllen, bei den Mood Tracker kann ich mich immer nur zwischen 2 entscheiden da ich nicht die Premium Funktion benutze. Es wäre schöner wenn man noch etwas hinzu schreiben könnte oder wenn man zum Beispiel einen Schlaf Tracker hätte.

Author: Rafan Kv
Body: Actually this app made me so happy thank you so much 🥰

Author: bulganerdene tserendagva
Body: So good

Author: brianna 2shoes
Body: Highly recommend! This app is such a straightforward way to track my moods along with activities or triggers. The mini journal feature has made it easy to jot down memories at the end of the day. There's so much that you can customize, but you don't have to. I changed the colours to ones that felt right for me but left everything else for now. I only have the free version right now but am seriously considering getting the full version.

Author: purple tree
Body: The creator had done hard work to create this app but at least left few more free theme. All are premium🥺I'm sorry this broke couldn't afford a coffee for you. Overall this app is wonderful.

Body: Aku masih 1 Karena ini gak bagis gak Sesyai sama gambarny klo mau nyari apk yg Bener dong!!!!!

Author: Charlie Clements
Body: So far so good. So much on free version, but I want to get the premium it's so good! Update I had to change my review from 5 to 2 stars due to it being glitchy, which is a shame. Quite frustrating really...something good came out of it though. You've inspired me to make my own bullet journal on paper so thanks for that!

Body: You only get 2 free images then the rest you have to pay for the premium membership which is $5 a month. It's not worth it for what you get. I can do the same thing on paper for free.

Author: Eve Arramy
Body: La plupart des thèmes sont payant

Author: Rosa
Body: I used to be love it and actually suggested the app to most of my friends , but now there're only 2 free themes (they aren't beautiful at all) so they force me to stop using the theme I had used for almost a year...

Author: Sarah Jane Morales
Body: Thiss is a great app and probably one of the best! I like gow I manage my notes and my to-do lists in here without difficulties. Such great app.

Author: zoe Gacha
Body: Les thèmes sont devenus payant, il n'y a aucun choix. C'est dommage, car c'est une bonne application, mais je suis vraiment déçue.

Author: Carolynn Durand
Body: I absolutely loved the app, it was cute and made journalism fun to me. But I have to take away stars because basically all of the themes have been made for premium only. I loved this app because for once, there was no subscription needed. Pretty upsetting. I really hope they change it back in the next update, I don't want to have to find a new journal app.

Author: myah nadeau
Body: I used to love this app but now that there are only TWO free themes to choose from, it's not worth it.

Author: Viridiana Goytia
Body: Muy limitado

Author: Ana Carbó de Haya
Body: Es malísima todas o la mayoría de fondos son premium.

Author: Deanna Nix
Body: EDIT: ANOTHER APP RUINED BY GREED, SAD. I WILL GO BACK TO PRINTING MY PAGES LIKE THIS OR SWITCH TO A FREE APP. love this beautiful and inspired take on mood tracking apps, there's so many that tend to feel boring after you have been using them a while so I always get discouraged and end up falling out of the habit of using it, but with beautiful moods I'm always eager to input my mood and get closer to perfecting the magical, beautiufl work of art that will be completed by the end of the month.

Author: alejandro prado
Body: Antes la aplicación estaba demasiado bien, pero ahora para usar cualquier tema hay que pagar , solo deja dos temas y que son nada estéticos , es una pena ya que llevaba tiempo con la aplicación , pero siendo así la desinstalare

Author: Brittany Huber
Body: Used to be great. Now it's just pay per month to use anything but the 2 free themes they give you. Which is tree's or gems..... and neither looks good

Author: tin zar
Body: Very good app! I have been using this since July. Thank you for making this app.

Author: Nick Ross
Body: Why is my review constantly getting deleted. Another reason not to download.

Author: Bushra Patel
Body: I loved this app, it's such a shame I have to give it three stars only. I place a lot of value on the themes and after the last update, there's only two free ones available. The tree one isn't very pretty and the gem one will become very mundane very quickly. I wouldn't mind the premium functionality if these free options were more and better quality but they're not. That's such a shame. I can't even use the ones I was using before, they're also unavailable to me. It was the perfect app.

Author: Carter King
Body: Used to love this app. Cute art, unobtrusive reminders. The new update makes it less enjoyable. I get that illustration is hard and that developers and artists deserve compensation and that the themes were free to start for the launch, but leaving only 2 free themes? There should be more options because a lot of people cannot afford $5 per month or even $20 per year for a mood tracker right now, myself included. Now instead of feeling creative, it's just repetitive and really isn't fun to use.

Author: Gerrica Jones
Body: I loved it when you could pick wallpaper/backgrounds/themes no matter what they were without having to subscribe. But I guess I can understand why y'all took this route. I'm just not happy with the fact there are only two free themes.

Author: Cécile Gouillon
Body: Les thèmes sont devenus payants et impossible d'accéder au mode premium... donc plus de thèmes disponibles. J'enlève donc toutes les étoiles possibles.

Author: Gazeta
Body: Wszystko płatne 2 motywy za darmo? To śmieszne nie polecam

Author: Fritzi M. Bautista Santana
Body: Premium kinda ruined the experience for me, after being able to have access to everything for months before.. but overall it's the easiest way to keep track of your mood.

Author: Jornalismo jornalismo
Body: the premium version destroyed all app interactivity.

Author: Twister #love
Body: It is a good app, but since the newest update you can only choose from two themes, and I think this is a no go. I would never buy premium, its way to expensive, just for a few pixels, but two themes are literally nothing. And dear whoever decidet this, its not making people buy premium, its making people delete this app, me includet. Do better.

Author: Renée McDonald
Body: Used to be great, but now with premium it's lousy. I have more than 360 days in, and now I'm limited to 2 themes. Now I am seriously considering getting rid of this app. Edit: days because my phone wants to think I've been using it longer than I have.

Author: Bel Wing
Body: Disappointed as I have been using the UFO theme for 8 months, and wanted to continue it for September, and now it's under premium?

Author: Naomi van Loenen
Body: Mooie app maar er zijn helaas maar 2 thema's en dat is jammer want je kan niet elke keer een andere doen eerst kon je wel premium gebruiken gratis nu niet meer dat is erg jammer..

Author: A W
Body: I love this app, but with the integration of the premium, I am really upset. I have been using this app since January and I loved that I had so many amazing free themes to pick from and it made me want to use it every single day. And now with the integration of the premium, I no longer have that function and though it may be a small monthly payment, it's a payment I can't do right now. And it makes me want to not use the app because I do not want the same two themes every month.

Author: Martine-May Nguyen
Body: Dommage que les thèmes soient devenus payants.

Author: otata kim
Body: I like how your app reminds me to track my mood. But i enjoyed your app only for a month and now prettier layouts are locked as premium :( Wished you are allowing more than 2 free layouts to choose from.

Author: Eliel Rai
Body: I can't. *Open the app* please help

Author: CR Ramírez
Body: Me gusta lo que ofrece, simple, bonita y con lo que necesito en mi día a día.

Author: Ashley Jeoja
Body: I love this app as I've wanted to bullet journal and mood tracker for a while, however my drawing capability is mastering stick figures. This is perfect as it gives me the joy of mood tracking with the flexibility of writing snippets of my day or noting my activities. Loads of color schemes to choose from however I do wish you could make your own. Overall though, a very useful and fun app :)

Author: irma de maria us hernandez
Body: Me encanta todo es de mi estilo a mí me gusta el diseño. Pero siempre esta muyyyyyy lenta no sé si solo a mi pasa. Me gustaría que arregle eso porfa porque es la única app que me encanta pero es muy lenta , busque algo similar pero solo está me encanta por favorrrrrrr arreglen esoooooo.

Author: Elmys R. Itanare R.
Body: La instalé y nunca abrió

Author: Kamea Martinez
Body: I love this app 💓I love how it track my mood that why I give it a five stars rating

Author: kari bear
Body: How do you delete or edit an activity? I made a typo and I can't figure out how to fix it.

Author: Aya Boubrit
Body: Cute bullet journal 🌻🌻 i really like it 🌼

Author: Amethyst Moon
Body: This ap really is beautiful! Exactly what i was looking for. You can have a beautiful bullet journal without having to draw the chart yourself. I just wish you could have multiple charts per month to keep track of more habbits then just mood. Like water intake, excercise, books to read/movies to watch ect..

Author: Ron C. Nieto
Body: I adore this app: it's hands down the most beautiful journaling app, it offers a ton of tracking detail without being overwhelming and the monthly page makes me want to write every day. There are just two things keeping it from perfection: first, I've just found out entries have a limited length. That's a problem if we're using it for therapeutic long form journaling. Second, please add a synch feature? I write on both tablet and phone, and two-way manual export-import every day is a major pain!

Author: Jisoonun _soyası
Body: Gösterildiği gibi değil ❌

Author: Chị Khủng Long Bông Hoa
Body: Như kiểu...quản lí cảm xúc ấy!

Author: laulau AP
Body: Très bonne idée... mais trop lent... la configuration personnelle ne s'est jamais terminée... resté bloqué sur"allons y" pendant 10mn! J'ai désinstallé... dommage

Author: Luna Moonstone
Body: Literally my favorite app!!!!! Its so pretty and customizable. I'd like for it to sync with my calendar but otherwise it's awesome.

Author: Sol Quiroz
Body: Es lo que buscaba, buen diseño, los colores... Pero se pone muuy lenta y es imposible darle uso.

Body: Superb! New user. So far, so great!

Author: Angela Cruz
Body: Really loving the app so far. One thing of note is I hope that you could add more moods rather than just few predetermined ones. Moods vary, not just sad to happy. Other than that, this app is perfect for me.

Body: Excellent, c'est vraiment cool cette appli

Author: Quetzalzin Sánchez Fausto
Body: Me encantan los diseños que tienen

Body: appena installata, sembra bella! ma la cosa che ho subito notato è che non c'è l'italiano...io e penso anche altri italiani senza la nostra lingua non ci capiamo un tubo. quindi prima pecca da sistemare è la lingua dell'app. GRAZIE DELLA COMPRENSIONE SPERO SISTEMIATE AL PIÙ PRESTO <3

Author: Meriem
Body: Excellent, mais quand j'appuie sur n'importe quel bouton, sa prend du temps pour faire l'action Pouvez vous m'aider?

Author: Francesca Hepplewhite
Body: Very useful for tracking moods etc. Without having to write/draw it all out in a bullet journal! Navigation isn't always very intuitive so it takes a bit of work to find everything but once you know how it works it's great!

Body: Nếu có phần thông báo thì sẽ ok hơn

Author: seul kang
Body: THIS IS THE BEST OF THE BEST OMG. I'm so lucky I found this app, and it's free. Thank you so much for working this!! I was able to keep track on what I do daily and not panic every time I can't remember anything I did lmao. It's kind of confusing at first because there's so many features and buttons but when you know how to use them, they make your notes so ORGANIZED and pretty (ʃƪ＾3＾）

Author: Merel van Duivenvoorde-Schrijver
Body: Very well designed app, it's functional and looks beautiful 😍

Author: Katerin Valseca
Body: Es muy lenta y no me sirven todas las funciones.pesimo

Author: Zakiyah Dwi
Body: Good aps

Author: James Terry
Body: This app has a slightly confusing interface but once you get the hang of navigation the app itself is genius. It has almost all the features you need to better yourself and see how diffrent habits and activities affect your mood. One thing I would like to see the app incorporate is a way to upload photos to your journal entries. I rated 5 stars though because honestly this app is spectacular and I would and have recommend it to my friends.

Author: Amateur Chef
Body: Please add a task tracker,and monthly spreads I think it would be better it's very beautiful either way.

Author: lucie lhôte
Body: The concept of the mood wheel is so perfect!!! 😲 But.. why is it not editable? It would be the coolest mood tool in the world

Author: kasi.
Body: I think the app is great but it can be slow to move around.

Author: Aenar Apps
Body: Really colorful and beautiful. It makes it really easy and interesting to keep track not only of your daily mood but also monthly and yearly. I also really like the new updates with habits and the weel, i'm really grateful the app keeps bringing us new quality content :))

Author: Hitomy Chane
Body: Good

Author: Kate Milosevic
Body: This app is lovely, the graphics are beautiful and I love the clean interface. I like that the journal needs to be found rather than appearing openly on stats pages and the activities are perfect when swiftly checking in. The only thing I wish is that it had more than 5 options for how I'm feeling, 7 options would make it so much easier to track moods changing - distinguishing awesome days from good ones and slightly more positive than negative days.

Author: Juliette Deronziere
Body: C'est presque parfait.

Author: Josh Lucas
Body: Great daily reminder to reflect on the day. It has a ton of deeper features like journaling and prompts that i have yet to explore. Try it out! The free version is feature rich and free of obtrusive ads.

Author: _White - Fox_
Body: Слишком много платного :(

Author: Arely Francisco Tolentino
Body: Acabo de instalar esta aplicación y me encantó esta súper tiene todo lo que necesito les doy las gracias a los creadores por crear está aplicación se la recomiendo demasiado

Author: maria muñoz
Body: Me encantan los diseños, que puedas elegir los colores, las anotaciones. Puede ordenar mi día con las actividades que tengo que realizar

Author: Yederith Loner
Body: ¡Me encanta! Está muy lindo y es funcional. Incluye estadísticas. Muy recomendado.

Body: I downloaded it a minute ago and I love it! 💕💕🥰🥰

Author: Elena Mancheva
Body: It's great I love it the only thing that's kind of annoying is when you set a theme and its colors apply for all other themes in the calendar and it's ugly

Author: Antonio Montero
Body: Muy buena app y con buen diseño. Estaría bien que se pudieran poner directamente las preguntas del diario sin entrar previamente en "cosas para hacer". También podrían poner que se pudieran escoger los colores de los estados de ánimo (poner un apartado de "personalizado" o algo así) y que puedas editar/eliminar las actividades que añadas ya que hay puedes equivocarte al añadirlas. Otra cosa que podrían implementar es un widget del calendario.

Author: PrinCesS Jakieś
Body: Mimo, że dopiero co zainstalowałam tą aplikację to już mi się podoba. Jest przejrzysta i naprawdę dobrze sprawdza się jako bullet journal tylko, że na telefonie. Jedynym problemem dla niektórych może być, że nie ma języka polskiego. Tak poza tym to bardzo polecam.

Body: Please have more free themes!!

Author: BIANCA AVASILECHIOAE
Body: I liked😁😁😁

Author: April Stanton
Body: This is EXACTLY what I've been looking for! Easy and elegant mood tracker with habit prompts and journal prompts. Absolutely incredible with every feature that I've ever wanted and it's easy to navigate. *chefs kiss*

Author: Ellie Wood
Body: I love this app so much, it's so helpful for mood tracking and helping with keeping habits. Not too complicated to use and makes the bullet journal idea quicker (I have a super short attention span so this is great for me!)

Author: soifi :D
Body: Es lentísima, de pronto tocaba algo, pensaba que no hacía nada pero al rato cuando trataba de hacer otra cosa así se corregía algo que yo había presionado antes?¿?!¿¡¡??!¿¡???¿?!¡ muy lenta, para eso mejor podría ocupar mi calendario.

Author: Venus Lee

Author: Dann Vázquez

Author: Reana Grim
Body: This has been really helpful in keeping track of my moods and stress levels I do kinda wish it had a widget or timed notification where we could just hold it down and select our current mood. That'd be great for work. Lovely app, truely has helped me keep on top of my mental health

Author: amy
Body: Simplemente decepcionante, me esperaba mucho más, la app es lentísima tarda desmasiado en hacer TODO y cuando quiero escribir algo simplemente no me lanza el teclado, luego voy a google y si tengo el teclado es cosa de la app :(

Body: Me encanta el diseño pero entre más días actualizo más lenta se vuelve, cada vez tarda más en abrir y prácticamente tengo que cerrarla y volverla a abrir después de cada acción porque nunca terminan de cargar :c

Author: Darkstays
Body: Simple, well made and really effective. Does what it's made to do and that's it. You can track your mood and habits beautifully (pun intended), no ads, no bs.

Dort kann man ich zwar richtig tolle Ideen holen, aber zur Anwendung in der App ist sehr schlecht. Außerdem ist die Seite abgestürzt. Also für Ideen sehr gut aber Anwendung in der App schlecht.

Author: Ana Maria Ilisei
Body: I so love it! I like being aesthetic and this app has the themes I need ♡♡♡

Author: Lunz
Body: Ich liebe die App ! Alles kostenlos keine Werbung und super gestaltet hübsche Themes viel Auswahl und man kann auch Aufgaben Tagebucheinträge und Habits aufschreiben.Super übersetzt

Author: Winter Boy
Body: Absolutely adore this app; just wish we had some more free themes! Helped me set so many habits and start them whilst being able to show my progress, ups and downs and everything else. Adore this app and recommending it to so many people

Author: Sage Yathon
Body: This app is the best!

Author: Flavio W
Body: I love the overall aesthetic and the idea behind it. It's really helpful to see how my mood was in the past visually. What is a bit lacking though imho is the habit building part, but that is not the main function I use it for anyway. Keep up the great work!

Author: Priskila Esperansa
Body: Sukakk banget, temanya juga banyak. Buruan download yukk..

Author: Ale Xia
Body: Llevos dos días usandolaxD Y me encantaaaa sólo que ojalá los temas que salen sigan siendo gratis y no se vuelvan premium :( son muy bonitos!! 😍

Author: CaliH Han
Body: I love this app so much! Since 2 month I use it every day to journal my feelings and habits. It's simple, I like the cute styles of the themes and needs only 1 minute a day.

Author: Jilian Vanessa Lopez
Body: Aesthetically amazing!

Author: Carol Lee
Body: Vey good, if can add picture will be better👍

Author: Jade Kincaid
Body: This has definitely become my favorite journaling app. I would never really write out about day to day stuff with my moods, but this is great for doing that and the layout is wonderful. I did find a little bug. I started using the option for daily prompts. I couldn't seem to edit to reword the prompt nor remove it from the daily prompts that pop up, even though it's no longer in the settings to do so. Update: emailed and received quick response to fix the prompt issue I was having :)

Author: Andrea Smith
Body: I rarely rate anything, but I had to come let everyone know how great this app is! The way it tracks your mood and how activities affect is perfect 👌 I have also been tracking my triggers for mental health as "activities." And the fact that it is like those cute bullet journal mood trackers is just the cherry on top! There are no ads and its very intuitive/ easy to use. Its very nice on the eyes too - clean and simple! I would recommend this app to all my friends!

Author: MJ
Body: Very nice to look at but doesn't let you set up a habit for multiple times in one day.

Author: we found a love
Body: Very good bulletjournal, though notifications are not working.

Author: persona real
Body: La aplicación es muy buena, es la más completa que he encontrado, mis respetos a los desarrolladores de la app.

Author: Agos Taborda
Body: Muy buena app. Te ayuda a estar concentrado en tus emociones y te ayuda a crecer. La app ya está en español, era la pieza faltante para hacerla la mejor, muchas gracias!

Author: Nicole Köhler
Body: Gestern den Wunsch geäußert, bitte auf Deutsch und heute schon erledigt.... Prima, sehr süße App, bin noch am testen und gespannt

Author: María Solís
Body: Super bueno y bonito

Author: melissa bos
Body: Love this app!!! I am a visual person so it helps me keep track of how I am feeling. I been tell so many people about it. I am able to keep track of my mood everyday because the app gives me a notification. It take a few seconds to fill it out.

Author: krishnamadhusudhan reddy
Body: Wonderful app that too Free. Blessings to the Developer.

Author: Colleen Scott
Body: Overall good experience with one issue. When clicking on the reminder after midnight, it logs the mood for the following day instead of the one that just ended. Wish there was a way to copy an entry over when realizing that it was entered on the wrong day instead of redoing it. Also does spam notifications with 3-4 alerts some days. However, love the color customization options and all the ways to view and sort. LOVE that you can add your own activities too!

Author: mujerMUNDIAL BAC
Body: bonito y funcional

Author: Sara Báez (SARAFARA)
Body: Buena la app

Author: Melissa Calderon
Body: Hermosa aplicación, me encantó, pero si estuviera en español me enamoraría de ella.

Author: Landu Aynara
Body: So far so good, no glitch or anything and totally customizable. I'll give higher stars once I really understand how to use all of the features! ❤

Author: Linda Oglesbee
Body: This app is absolutely beautiful. It's a great way to help me reflect on my day and see my past mood for the entire month. It really puts me in a better mood. Thank you so much devs!

Author: Paula R.
Body: I like this app a lot. I had some issues at first but I wrote to the developer and she replied quickly. Problem solved. Quite satisfied.

Author: Jo Stoch
Body: I really like this app, definitely makes journaling/daily check in a fun thing to do!

Author: Brittany Davis
Body: I love the layout of the app and it's pretty easy to use. I was going to use this for keeping up with daily posts for my business. I can create a to-do for that day, but it doesn't show up. I need to be able to look in advanced so I can make plans the night before. If that could be fixed, I'd change my rating. But right now, I'm just gonna have to go the old school way and have a physical bullet journal.

Author: Adèle Molas
Body: Simple d'utilisation, ça remplit le job ! On aimerait un peu plus d'options, mais ça viendra j'en suis sûre !

Author: rasyiqa suhaimi
Body: i like this app so much❤

Author: Damiana Nirmala
Body: This is the greatest journal app so far!! I've been journaling for 3 weeks because it's so fun using this app. Its daily 📆 journal questions also helps me to reflect and understand myself more 😊. I also use emojis like this in my journal to make it more fun. Anyways, I suggest to give a strong lock 🔒 from the app because my phone face recognition can't differentiate me and my siblings. I want a bit more privacy 🥺.

Author: Ainara
Body: Me encanta es una monada.Si no te quieres comprar un bullet de verdad está está bien

Author: Hannah Ryser

Author: Stacey Taylor
Body: This has been so helpful to me in tracking how my moods ebb and flow over time, as well as which activities help/hamper me. Beautiful, simple, just a great app!

Body: Beautiful

Author: Nerak Mar
Body: Me encanta, seria mejor si tuviera más idiomas pero es fenomenal, nunca había visto tan hermosa aplicación.

Author: Paige C
Body: It's very easy to use and isn't overly complicated. Even on days when I'm feeling overwhelmed, it's very easy to pop on the app and record your mood without feeling like it's a hassle or a task. Which can be hard to do when you experience low mental health days. I actually enjoy getting the notification reminding me to log my mood. Plus, being able to visualize your data with the images is very fun!

Author: Elsie Nyangor
Body: It's a beautiful app just as the name suggests. I love that I can customize the colours and themes. The journal prompts are sth I look forward to. The founder is very responsive and kind. I get fast responses on the IG page. I can also add questions from a set that the app can ask me everyday. In short, I recommend.💯

Body: Esta en ingles y no se descarga

Body: La mejor app que es descargado la recomiendo

Author: Jade Afable
Body: Love the app its so cute! But it would be better if users have the option to have their own custom palette.

Author: Oulen Ujin
Body: ♥cool cute

Author: Bri
Body: Very insightful, intuitive, and nice to look at! I would like to be able to apply moods only to certain activities. Right now it seems that if I don't set a mood to an activity it defaults to neutral, would be nice to just not have a mood associated at all. Other than that small suggestion I'm a big fan!

Author: Deepak kumar
Body: It is a very, very good app to track your mood. The themes are adorable and pretty and the reports give the accurate data of your mood throughout the day/month/year. Overall the best app for mood tracking..must try!! ♡

Author: MELANI LAGUNA
Body: It would be less than they put to change language because the application is beautiful but some of us do not know English it would be good to change the language

Author: Janet Crader
Body: Loving the writing prompts. Receiving a daily reminder and have a place to more what I'm grateful for is awesome! Keeps me focused on the good!

Author: Evan Urquhart
Body: The great art and simple interface makes using this mood tracker a joy. I've recommended it to two friends already and they loved it too. I chose the space theme for my first month, already looking forward to choosing a new one in February. If I could give this more stars, I would.

Author: Jessica Verenisse Nájera
Body: Luv it

Body: O app é mais ou menos. Só tem dois temas disponíveis gratuitamente :/ Você não pode escrever sobre os dias anteriores,fora que a parte das anotações é bem básica. Tem muuuuito oq melhorar,mas pra quem tá procurando algo básico, rápido e prático para o dia a dia é bom...

Author: Grace Pelham

Body: Spanish please

Author: Leandra Roth
Body: Absolutely beautiful & intuitive. It's perfect!

Author: Grace Vash
Body: Excellent app! I hate reviewing apps so I usually don't, but for this one I made an exception. This app is: • Aesthetically pleasing • Allows you to sort by factors and get the insights • Allows you to track moods with very simple options I've only used it for a day and I love it so much! Very wonderful app! 10/10 would recommend!

Body: Not enough mood choices but easy to operate. Just got it but so far I am enjoying it.

Author: Megnen !
Body: Mood tracker, more than a bullet journal. I didn't see how to set goals or anything... Just track the mood and activities

Author: Danna Paola Flores Vallesteros
Body: I love the app, But I think it would be so good to be able to use other Lenguages.

Author: May Chang
Body: I like the esthetic of the app and it's very easy to use. It would be nice to see more features outside of just tracking mood, activities and journaling.

Author: Leah Mell
Body: Horrible. Not what I expected.

Author: Muntii Stancosi Iarna -Toamna
Body: Fain.

Author: Cheyenne Mascall
Body: My first time using an app like this. I am two weeks in and I like the cute, colourful display options and interface, the settings are very customisable and the categories of activities are editable. I get the choice to add general entries (multiple per day if I want) or answer prompts, the reminders are useful but not intrusive and there aren't any ads so far. I particularly like that I can assign a colour/mood per activity and that mix of moods can show up, if I want, on the summary page.

Author: duda tica
Body: Amo esse app e o melhor que eu ja usei amo muito ele e o melhor

Author: Caty Bou
Body: En français serait un plus

Author: Mack Skodiak
Body: Beautiful app, wonderful ui. Love the design. Would like in future: - import from json instead of csv only or at least from more file types - dark mood?

Author: Richard Wilson III
Body: Great tracker. Mark activities, Journal, or just mark a mood 1-5 and your done. There is even a feature to turn it into 1-10 for more accuracy, and daily / one off prompts for the journal. Plus No Ads, Permissions or In App Purchases. One of my favorite apps :)

Author: lemon ti
Body: great app, cute themes and colours. love it!

Author: NovaRanger
Body: Wow, I like the application very much, It's easy to enter data and the colour splatter effect for multiple moods in single day is nice.. Themes are very well designed. The settings page seems to have some up down fling issues, but it's minimal. Very good app.

Author: Marva Abel
Body: Aku kasi 3 dulu karena baru proses download , knp aku berani kasi 3 langsung ? Karena aku liat rating apk ini udh bagus , jadi aku kasi bintang 3 mungkin kalo udh ke download dan udh dipake bakal aku rating sejujurku . Btw aku lagi belajar bikin journal + latering , mungkin ada yg bisa bisa ajarin aku . Xixixi>.< . Ok , by . Jan skip makan Nee .

Author: Romina Marleny Chafloque Chero
Body: Esta app es genial. Pero en un futuro creo que es mejor que la pongan en español

Author: Captain Hook
Body: Very nice, very pretty, extremely user friendly. Not what I was looking for, but certainly not a bad app by any means!

Author: Elli
Body: Edit 12/12/20 Thank you so much for responding to my concerns about the lag and bug of the app💕. This app deserve millions of dowloads. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a journal that has a built in mood tracker with an advanced reports. I installed some apps but this is the only app that has a very precise and accurate reports and statistics for ✨FREE!✨ Thank you so much developer/s for making it available to everyone, so much love💕

Author: valentain -chan
Body: Muy buena la app pero el problema es que solamente esta en ingles y no entendia nada, y tambien que abiliten una seccion de notas

Author: Arnado, Andrea Faith
Body: I LOVE THIS APP! The features are really cool and stunning and it really helps ❤

Author: Heidi Bell
Body: Great introduction to journaling. I have tried many apps before and this is the keeper. I love being able to customise the look for each month and the year in pixels is exactly what I need. Being able to set up affirmations and prompts gives a real focus to my journaling.

Author: Yas Mine
Body: tres bonne application ; tres utile pour se motiver a adopter une nouvelle habitude et rester concentrer sur son objectif chaque jour tt le mois 👍👍👍

Author: Anna Joy Flores
Body: Really great, just find it hard to navigate. Stiff, when you scroll it goes on the opposite or it just stuck. It sometimes annoying but really great app. Hope you can fix/improve this ❤️

Author: Ana Gabriela
Body: Me fascina es una aplicación demasiado hermosa la recomiendo sirve demasiada para bullet journal

Author: Mylth K
Body: (Edit: Wow! So we can track multiple moods per day! Thanks dev! xD now my potions look amazing xDDD Thanks for your response!) Whoa! I've never seen any app made with so much care! The concept of filling the whole picture with mood colors is stunning. It's fun and it makes you feel good when looking back at the previous days. (I mean, when using mood tracking, sometimes we hate ourselves when looking back on the report.) Other functions are friendly as well! 10/10 & LOVE!

Author: Priscilla Carey
Body: I like it alot. Very customizable.

Author: Aqila study
Body: Bagus bgt aku suka deh. Bagi kalian yg suka nulis curhat curhatan, diary, dan perasaan kalian bisa pakek app ini beneran bagus aku paling suka mood nya

Author: Alexis Finley
Body: Absolutely perfect! I've tried habit and mood tracking in a journal before but always end up forgetting to log everything! Having it on my phone (and with notifications!!) makes it sooo much easier. Only thing I would change is allowing the user to change/create names of activities to allow for more accurate tracking!

Author: Thiago Almeida
Body: Nice and fun to use. I find it nice than writing a journal

Author: Chelsy Ratcliffe
Body: Makes tracking moods and feelings easy. I like being able to relate feelings to specific and customizable things like work and family along with overall mood and note taking.

Author: S T
Body: Maar 2 thema's zijn gratis en de gratis thema's zijn niet mooi uitgewerkt

Author: Erin T
Body: Simple and quick.

Author: Paola Juarez Limón
Body: Great app

Author: Christie Weins
Body: I downloaded the app based on an article my friend sent me on FB. It's good to just give myself a little debrief at the end of the day. It's customizable so I've added a few of my own prompts. I forget to add moods throughout the day so I just do it at night but it's really great. The themes are very cute and it actually does feel like I'm bullet journalling the way it's set up. I hope she expands to a "full service" bullet journal because I love the look and feel of it.

Author: Janice Schmidt
Body: Pleasantly surprised! In the past I've found mood tracking and journaling to be helpful, but too much work for a busy life. This is so easy and quick, that I actually do it! Love the Report that summarizes your weekly or monthly experience.

Author: B B
Body: Really like the daily reminder to reflect on my day!

Author: Serese Selanders
Body: Love it!

Author: Anna-Maria Keyter
Body: Fun and easy!

Author: Carly Schmidt
Body: This mood tracking app is fun and easy to use. The graphics are beautiful. Recommend!

Author: Randi Sawatzky
Body: What a clever idea! The app is so beautiful and effortless to use. Love it!!
